title: Tetrate Names Finance Veteran Paul Machle as CFO - Yahoo Finance
content: Tetrate Names Finance Veteran Paul Machle as CFO  Yahoo Finance
description: SAN FRANCISCO, May 03, 2022--Tetrate, the enterprise service mesh company driving zero trust architecture and reducing the complexity of modern hybrid cloud, announced today the appointment of Paul Machle as Chief Financial Officer (CFO). A finance veteran, Machle brings over 20 years of experience on senior leadership teams for both private and public high-growth software companies.
